full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MKHA' 'GRO SENG GDONG MA'I BZLOG BSGYUR ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(ZHES YE SHES KYI MKHA' 'GRO SENGGE'I GDONG CAN GYI BZLOG BSGYUR DGRA BGEGS BZLOG PHYIR BYA BA 'DI NI, MCHOD DPON BLO BZANG DAR RGYAS KYIS BSKUL BA, RANG DANG SKAL MNYAM GZHAN LA'ANG PHAN PA 'BYUNG DAM SNYAM PA'I BSAM PAS, BLO 'PHRIN MING CAN GYIS, BLA MA GONG MA RNAMS KYI GSUNG RGYAN LA BRTEN NAS, BGYIS PA 'DI LA NOD PA'I TSOGS CI MCHIS PA THAMS CAD BLA MA MKHA' 'GRO'I TSOGS LA 'CHAGS SO BZOD PAR MDZAD DU GSOL, ,MI MTHUN PHYOGS LAS RGYAL BAR GYUR CIG , ,,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
